CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Travel to Destination stage positioned above or below the Select Accommodation stage?
SRP.A: The Travel to Destination stage is positioned {below} the Select Accommodation stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Leave Review?
VE.A: The value of stage Leave Review is {428}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Book Flight?
VE.A: The value of stage Book Flight is {1648}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Travel to Destination?
VE.A: The value of stage Travel to Destination is {1022}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Search Travel Packages, with a value of {2296}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Leave Review, with a value of {428}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Check-in at Hotel to stage Leave Review?
SC.A: Decreased by {294} Thousand Tourists from stage Check-in at Hotel to stage Leave Review.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Search Travel Packages to stage Select Accommodation?
SC.A: Decreased by {322} Thousand Tourists from stage Search Travel Packages to stage Select Accommodation.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Book Flight to stage Make Reservation?
SC.A: Decreased by {313} Thousand Tourists from stage Book Flight to stage Make Reservation.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1491? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Search Travel Packages} stage has {2296}, the {Select Accommodation} stage has {1974}, the {Book Flight} stage has {1648}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 575? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 872 and 1491? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Make Reservation} stage has {1335}, the {Travel to Destination} stage has {1022}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Check-in at Hotel to Leave Review, or from stage Make Reservation to Travel to Destination?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Make Reservation} to {Travel to Destination} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Travel to Destination to Check-in at Hotel, or from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Flight} to {Make Reservation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Travel to Destination to Check-in at Hotel, from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation, or from stage Make Reservation to Travel to Destination?
NC.A: The reductions from stage {Travel to Destination} to {Check-in at Hotel}, {Book Flight} to {Make Reservation}, and {Make Reservation} to {Travel to Destination} are equal.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Check-in at Hotel to Leave Review, from stage Search Travel Packages to Select Accommodation, or from stage Select Accommodation to Book Flight?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Select Accommodation} to stage {Book Flight} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Select Accommodation} and {Book Flight} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Check-in at Hotel} and {Leave Review} stages.
